Verify CSP works when set with <meta>
  CSP bypassed: false

  CSP bypassed: false

>> ENABLING CSP BYPASS <<

Verify CSP is bypassed when set with <meta>
  CSP bypassed: true

  CSP bypassed: true

  CSP bypassed: true
